• **config** or **configure** - View current configuration
• **signin** or **login** - Sign in with authentication
• **help** - Show this help message
• Any other text will be echoed back with configuration info
You can configure this bot using the bot settings menu. Click the three dots (...) next to the bot name in the chat and select 'Settings' or 'Reconfigure'.
When configuring the bot, the search input field supports type-ahead autocomplete. Start typing to see matching suggestions.
